title: What did you get 4 christmas?
content:
i know it's a little late but what did you get 4 christmas?[quote]Quote:[hr]Woe to you Oh Earth and Sea
for the Devil sends the beast with wrath
because he knows the time is short
Let him who hath understanding
reckon the number of the beast
for it is a human number
its number is six hundred and sixty six.[hr][/quote]

title: Re: What did you get 4 christmas?
content: A stereo system, a shower radio, money, and a bunch other stuff.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v426/RoboRed/RoboredSig.jpg[/img]

title: Re: What did you get 4 christmas?
content: Some dvds, music, and various other items.. Nothing very special, or at least can't remember now.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: e
content:
An electric guitar, a sled, a 512 kingston memory stick (Well, I wanted 1.0 GB... but hey! If they'll pay; I won't complain!), and a few other random gifts (gloves, underwear, the works...).Tough Guys Wear Pink!!!
